## Impetus

This Unit focues on developing the R environment on your computer and making sure you are familiar with a set of skills to allow you to function in R.  You will learn:  
- [Setting Up R](./getting_R.html)  
- Data Types in R  
- Data Containers  
- Acquiring Data
